portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Portfolio is a web page designed to showcase and manage my personal work profile. It is my first complete project developed using TypeScript. Its goal is to be an impeccable and visually appealing application that provides a pleasant navigation experience.

musclelab.name: Muscle Lab
musclelab.description: Muscle Lab is a web page designed to manage a fictional gym. It features embedded payment methods, appointment scheduling, user-friendly interfaces, and an admin dashboard that allows administrators to set and modify various aspects of the gym, including lessons, locations, memberships, trainers, and more.

doggofinder.name: Doggo Finder
doggofinder.description: Doggo Finder is a web page designed to explore, find, and learn about more than 300 dog breeds. It features filters, sorting methods, forms, and easy interactions between the user and the database. The main goal of this application is to efficiently manage large amounts of data from various sources, with the primary ones being a PostgreSQL database and a REST API.
